ThingDef.label: Sleeping Spot
ThingDef.Description: Designates a spot on the ground where people should sleep. Neither comfortable, nor healthy.

ThingDef.Label: Hay bed
ThingDef.Description: A makeshift bed, made of hay and small branches. Just a step above sleeping on the ground. Not very healthy to sleep on.

ThingDef.Label: Hide bed
ThingDef.Description: A simple bed for sleeping in. Not very comfortable, however.

ThingDef.label: medieval single bed
ThingDef.Description: A comfy bed with fur. Fits one. One of the famous hunters of the Rimworlds came up with this bed design after claiming his 100th Thrumbo kill. In the attemp to display his pride he developed this bed. His ingenuity in bed building spread faster than the words from his big game hunt. His name was forgotten. But after years his beds live on showing the pride of hunters all over the Rimworlds.

ThingDef.Label: Hide bed double
ThingDef.Description: A large makeshift bed, makes you feel like you're in the stone age. Fits two.

ThingDef.label: medieval double bed
ThingDef.Description: A comfy bed with fur. Fits two. One of the famous hunters of the Rimworlds came up with this bed design after claiming his 100th Thrumbo kill. In the attemp to display his pride he developed this bed. His ingenuity in bed building spread faster than the words from his big game hunt. His name was forgotten. But after years his beds live on showing the pride of hunters all over the Rimworlds.

ThingDef.label: Fancy Bed
ThingDef.Description: A soft bedding provides a comfortable resting place for sleepy colonists.

ThingDef.label: Basic Bed
ThingDef.Description: A very basic mattress with sheets on a frame for resting.

ThingDef.label: industrial single bed
ThingDef.Description: A comfy bed. Fits one. The boom of industrial production led to the need of more qualified workers on the more developed Rimworlds. The constraints of space drove the development of more advanced furniture. As a result this quite simple bed desgin emerged.

ThingDef.label: prison bed (R)
ThingDef.Description: A bed on a wall for your prisoners. Fits only one. No effort was spared to make this bed look like it came out of the darkest deepest dungeon. The least amount of comfort and a hard surface to sleep will let your prisoners stay alert to finer things of their stay. An art well known among the medieval lords of the Rimworlds.

ThingDef.label: prison bed (L)
ThingDef.Description: A bed on a wall for your prisoners. Fits only one. No effort was spared to make this bed look like it came out of the darkest deepest dungeon. The least amount of comfort and a hard surface to sleep will let your prisoners stay alert to finer things of their stay. An art well known among the medieval lords of the Rimworlds.

ThingDef.label: Simple Bed
ThingDef.Description: A cozy mattress with sheets on a metal frame for resting.

ThingDef.label: Luxury Bed
ThingDef.Description: The luxury is the ultimate bed in terms of comfort. This is a bed fit for royalty.

ThingDef.label: Millenium Bed
ThingDef.Description: Millenium Line Bed.

ThingDef.label: Double bed
ThingDef.Description: A simple double-wide bed that fits two people.

ThingDef.label: industrial double bed
ThingDef.Description: A comfy bed. Fits two. The boom of industrial production led to the need of more qualified workers on the more developed Rimworlds. The constraints of space drove the development of more advanced furniture. As a result this quite simple bed desgin emerged.

ThingDef.label: Luxury Double Bed
ThingDef.Description: The only thing better than a luxury bed is one twice the size! You don't even have to share it with anyone! All that extra sleeping room provides a bit more comfort. This one comes with snazzy green sheets.

ThingDef.label: lover's double bed
ThingDef.Description: A comfy bed for your lovers. Fits two. The Model "heart-3000" is very popular in the more develpoed Rimworlds. It's mostly bought by couples and owners of certain establishments. Due to the Rimworlds not being the safest place and in the face of a possible sudden death the delieveries to the colonies in the Rimworlds have doubled over the years. Followed by a "mysterious" increase in population on these planets.

ThingDef.label: Millenium Double Bed
ThingDef.Description: Millenium Line Double bed.

ThingDef.label: crypto single bed
ThingDef.Description: A comfy crypto bed. Fits one. During the research of cryptosleep the possibilty of a short sleeping cycle based on this technology emerged. However most people still refuse to use these beds in fear of never waking up or losing several years by accident. This lead to several Rimworld legends although all exposed by scientists as fictional storys many people fear the device.

ThingDef.label: space single bed
ThingDef.Description: A comfy bed. Fits one. On the task of "going to space" this bed was literally first developed as a small spacecraft. After this fatal first mistake the possibility to sleep inside and a bit more comfort was added. This didn't prevent the advertising agency from using the terms "fly in your sleep" and "sleeping on clouds". After several lawsuits from customers with strange injuries the advertisment changed to a more down-to-earth direction.

ThingDef.label: crypto double bed
ThingDef.Description: A comfy crypto bed. Fits two. During the research of cryptosleep the possibilty of a short sleeping cycle based on this technology emerged. However most people still refuse to use these beds in fear of never waking up or losing several years by accident. This lead to several Rimworld legends although all exposed by scientists as fictional storys many people fear the device.

ThingDef.label: space double bed
ThingDef.Description: A comfy bed. Fits two. On the task of "going to space" this bed was literally first developed as a small spacecraft. After this fatal first mistake the possibility to sleep inside and a bit more comfort was added. This didn't prevent the advertising agency from using the terms "fly in your sleep" and "sleeping on clouds". After several lawsuits from customers with strange injuries the advertisment changed to a more down-to-earth direction.

ThingDef.label: Pod Bed
ThingDef.Description: A futuristic bed with high rest effectiveness.

ThingDef.label: Hospital Bed
ThingDef.Description: A bed specially designed for injured people. Improves the chance of successful medical work.

ThingDef.label: Advanced Hospital Bed
ThingDef.Description: An advanced bed specially designed to treat injured people. Improves the chance of successful medical work even more than the hospital bed.

ThingDef.label: Animal Sleeping Spot
ThingDef.description: Designates a spot on the ground where animals should sleep.

ThingDef.label: Animal hay sleeping spot
ThingDef.description: A small box for animals to sleep in. Fits small animals like chickens, cats, or small dogs.

ThingDef.label: Chicken nest
ThingDef.description: A small nest for animals to sleep in. Fits smaller animals like chickens, cats, or small dogs.

ThingDef.label: Animal Sleeping Place
ThingDef.description: A small box for animals to sleep in. Fits smaller animals like chickens, cats or small dogs.

ThingDef.label: Animal Bed
ThingDef.description: A soft bed for animals to sleep on. Fits any animal.

ThingDef.label: Animal pillow
ThingDef.description: Millenium Line animal bed. Rest and treat your furry friends comfortably on the pillow. Pethair repellent and easy to clean.

ThingDef.label: Feeding Bowl
ThingDef.description: Your animals will love this bowl so much that they'll go eat out of here first!

ThingDef.label: Scratching Post
ThingDef.description: Provides your cats with a place to sharpen their claws.

ThingDef.label: Stone Stool
ThingDef.description: Primitive stone stool.

ThingDef.label: Wooden Stool
ThingDef.description: Is an authentic stool, fashioned after those found in the ruins of the Red Tree People on Xentis Ham.

ThingDef.label: Backless Stool
ThingDef.description: A very basic platform on which to sit. It lacks a backrest.

ThingDef.label: Pillow
ThingDef.description: Rest your tushie on this plushy cushion!

ThingDef.label: Slab Chair
ThingDef.description: Whoever said that stone is not comfortable? Prove everyone wrong with this replica of a perfectly comfortable stony chair.

ThingDef.label: Folding Stool
ThingDef.description: A piece of leather and some steel - et voilà! An ingenious way of sitting, invented by the Galga Ler on Achron V.

ThingDef.label: Bench
ThingDef.description: A simple platform on which to sit.

ThingDef.label: Dining Chair
ThingDef.description: A sturdy and attractive chair that is typically used for sitting at a table. It is a proper seating improvement over stools.

ThingDef.label: Egg armchair
ThingDef.description: Millenium Line Egg Armchair. Feel like a chick - sit in an egg..

ThingDef.label: Armchair
ThingDef.description: A large, soft and comfy seat. Great for relaxation. Whoever thought of adding soft padding to a chair is a genious.

ThingDef.label: Rustic couch
ThingDef.Description: A couch is the ultimate furniture piece for sitting satisfaction. Relaxing on it won't make colonists lazy, in theory at least.

ThingDef.label: Couch
ThingDef.description: A couch is type of furniture that could be suitable for two, but is usable by only one. It won't make colonists lazy, in theory at least.

ThingDef.label: Millenium Couch
ThingDef.Description: Millenium Line couch is the ultimate furniture piece for sitting satisfaction. Relaxing on it won't make colonists lazy, in theory at least.

ThingDef.label: Holographical Cell
ThingDef.description: Enter to galahoo, himself ! It need a human ?

ThingDef.Name: TableBase
ThingDef.description: People eat off tables when chairs are placed facing them.

ThingDef.label: Table (Short)
ThingDef.description: Colonists will eat off of tables when a chair is facing it. This short table is suitable for 4 at once.

ThingDef.label: Table (Long)
ThingDef.description: Colonists will eat off of tables when a chair is facing it. This long table is suitable for 8 at once.

ThingDef.label: Tea Table
ThingDef.description: Colonists will eat off of tables when a chair is facing it. This tiny glass table is suitable for 1.

ThingDef.label: Millenium Table
ThingDef.description: This splendidly designed table is the perfect center-piece for any dining room!

ThingDef.label: Cabinet
ThingDef.Description: A locker that can store a set clothing for easy outfit swapping. A colonist can be assigned ownership of this locker.

ThingDef.label: Locker
ThingDef.Description: A locker that can store a set clothing for easy outfit swapping. A colonist can be assigned ownership of this locker. It comes with dust contractor unit for that good, ancient feeling.

ThingDef.label: Commode
ThingDef.description: A place for colonist to store personal belongings. When placed with a bed it will increase comfort and rest effectiveness slightly. Up to 5 items.

ThingDef.label: Apparel Cupboard
ThingDef.description: Haulers carry apparel here for storage. Up to 5 items.

ThingDef.label: Barber Bench
ThingDef.Description: Place where hair go wild!

ThingDef.label: Dressing Table
ThingDef.description: A Dresser to make Pawns look more snappy.

ThingDef.label: Bookcase
ThingDef.description: A bookcase with a wide variety of books. Up to 5 items.

ThingDef.label: End Table
ThingDef.description: This small table goes well with a bed. When placed with a bed it will increase comfort and rest effectiveness slightly. Up to 5 items.

ThingDef.label: End Table with Lamp
ThingDef.description: A small table with a lamp and a drawer. It would be a nice addition beside a bed. Uses 20 W to light a small area.

ThingDef.label: Journal Table
ThingDef.description: A decorative table with a journal on it. Colonists can gather here to discuss the majestic journal and the mighty steed that is the table that it rests upon.
